fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: European Union Third Energy Package and European Union Winter Package
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: We are a state owned enterprise operating in the Hungarian power and natural gas retail markets. We are in the process of transformation to convert the company from a utility company into a home service provider through implementing new technologies and innovative solutions.
relevant_communication: Being fully compliant with the Third Energy Package we focus our business model on the framework of EU intitiatives as well as preceived market trends.
